markdownRemark.html:
This is the time to act. There are problems all around. This will prove to be a pivotal year in history. Leaders are failing by trying to protect themselves first and foremost.

How we act now will determine the future. Itâ€™s not time to return to the past. Act now upon virtues. Do more that will be looked back upon well in the years to come.

frontmatter.description: How we act now will determine the future. It's not time to return to the past. Act now upon virtues. Do more that will be looked back upon well in the years to come.
frontmatter.title: Time to act upon virtues
